mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.REFUND_NO ,D.M_NO ,I.M_NAME ,C.CODENAME AS REFUND_REASON ,A.ORDER_NO ,F.S_NAME ,A.REFUND_PRICE || ' 원' AS REFUND_PRICE ,( CASE WHEN G.COUPON_DETAIL IS NULL THEN '환불 쿠폰 없음' ELSE (G.COUPON_DETAIL || ' / ' || G.COUPON_NO || ' 원 상당 쿠폰' ) END ) AS REFUND_COUPON ,H.POINT_OUT || ' 포인트' AS REFUND_POINT ,B.CODENAME AS STEP_FLAG_STR ,(CASE WHEN A.STEP1_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP1_STATUS ,(CASE WHEN A.STEP2_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS STEP2_STATUS ,A.STEP1_DATE ,A.STEP2_DATE FROM THISREFUND A LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE B ON B.GRPCODE = 14 AND A.STEP_FLAG = B.CODE LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE C ON C.GRPCODE = 9 AND A.REFUND_REASON = C.CODE LEFT JOIN THISORDER D ON A.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN THISORDERDTL E ON D.ORDER_NO = E.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY F ON E.S_NO = F.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTCOUPON G ON D.COUPON_NO = G.COUPON_NO LEFT JOIN THISPOINT H ON A.ORDER_NO = H.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER I ON D.M_NO = I.M_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{param1} AND H.POINT_OUT IS NOT NULL AND H.POINT_TYPE = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE THISREFUND SET STEP_FLAG = 2 ,STEP2_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ORDER_NO = #{param1}

INSERT INTO THISPOINT ( POINT_NO ,M_NO ,ORDER_NO ,POINT_TYPE ,POINT_IN ,POINT_OUT ,POINT_USEDATE ) SELECT NVL(MAX(POINT_NO),0) + 1 ,M_NO ,ORDER_NO ,2 ,SUM(POINT_OUT) ,SUM(POINT_IN) ,SYSDATE FROM THISPOINT WHERE M_NO = #{param1} AND ORDER_NO = #{param2} GROUP BY M_NO, ORDER_NO
